tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE SurgicalRobots (
    robot_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    robot_name TEXT,
    maintenance_records JSONB,
    software_updates JSONB
)

CREATE TABLE robot_maintenances (
	maintenance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	robot_id INT,
	maintenance_date DATE,
	maintenance_type VARCHAR,
	maintenance_details TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_records (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    robot_id INT,
    maintenance_date DATE,
    maintenance_description TEXT,
    technician_name VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE robot_profiles (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
name VARCHAR(255),
serial_number VARCHAR(50),
manufacturer VARCHAR(100),
manufacture_date DATE,
last_maintenance_date DATE,
firmware_version VARCHAR(20));

CREATE TABLE maintenance_records (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
robot_id INT,
maintenance_date DATE,
maintenance_type VARCHAR(50),
maintenance_notes TEXT);

CREATE TABLE software_updates (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
update_id VARCHAR(20),
update_date DATE,
update_details TEXT);

CREATE TABLE robot_errors (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
error_id VARCHAR(20),
error_date DATE,
error_description TEXT);
